LanguageData.BM_SpacerExplosiveTrapDeployerAbilityMod: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module comes with a compact storage and launch system for deploying explosive IED traps from a distance. The implant needs to be loaded with high-explosive shells in order to function.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerAntigrainTrapDeployerAbilityMod: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module comes with a compact storage and launch system for deploying antigrain warhead IED traps from a distance. The implant needs to be loaded with an antigrain warhead in order to function.

This particular module comes with a compact storage and launch system for deploying firefoam IED traps from a distance. The implant needs to be loaded with firefoam shells in order to function.
